resources.string: The document provides a comprehensive overview of the topic,breaking down complex ideas into digestible sections. Key themes include analysis, synthesis, and evaluation of core concepts. Students should focus on understanding the relationships between different elements and how they interact within the broader context.

string-array.name: onboarding_content
string-array.item: Your AI-powered learning companion designed to make studying more effective and engaging.
Upload your study materials and receive instant, intelligent summaries that simplify complex topics.
Chat with your AI tutor for personalized help. Get explanations, solve problems, and deepen your understanding.
Access all your summaries and flashcards anytime. Everything is saved and organized for efficient revision.

resources.string: This Privacy Policy explains how the Study Assistant app collects, uses, and protects your information. By using this app, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. The app is designed to help you study using summaries, flashcards, and AI-powered assistance while respecting your privacy.

We collect only the information necessary to provide the core features of the app. This may include study summaries, flashcards, group titles, and basic account information such as a user identifier. Uploaded content and generated data are stored securely using cloud services. We do not collect sensitive personal information such as real names, addresses, or payment details.

The information collected is used solely to operate and improve the app’s features. This includes saving your study materials, generating summaries, organizing flashcards, and providing AI-based responses. Your data is never used for advertising or sold to third parties.

We do not share your personal data with third parties except when required to provide core app functionality, such as cloud storage or AI processing services. These services are used strictly to deliver features and are governed by their own privacy and security standards.

We take reasonable measures to protect your information using industry-standard security practices. Data is stored securely in cloud infrastructure with access controls in place. However, no method of electronic storage or transmission is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Any changes will be reflected within the app, and the updated date will be revised accordingly. Continued use of the app after changes are made indicates acceptance of the updated policy.

RecallMate is an AI-powered study assistant built to help students learn faster through smart summaries, flashcards, and 1:1 AI chat support. It helps you revise key concepts, test your understanding, and stay consistent with your learning. RecallMate is developed as an educational project with simplicity, usability, and transparency in mind.

string-array.name: help_faq_questions
string-array.item: Do I need an internet connection?

string-array.name: help_faq_answers
string-array.item: RecallMate is a study assistant app that helps you stay organized and focused while learning.
Yes, RecallMate is free to use. Some advanced features may be added in future updates.
An internet connection is required for login and syncing your data. Some parts may work offline depending on your device.
Yes. Your data is stored securely and is only accessible from your account.
You can contact support using the Email Support or Call Support options on this page.
